traits.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The timbermaw has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The timbermaw makes one attack with its tentacles. If that attack hits, the timbermaw can make one beak attack against the same target.

actions.name: Tentacles
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Beak
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
